titles.title: Forest Protection and Wildfire Prevention Act of 2003

To repeal the so-called Forest Service Appeals Reform Act and to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to develop an administrative appeals process for the Forest Service in the same manner as other Federal land management agencies.
